thread.title: Raiders’ dreams take flight in hands of Amari Cooper
thread.title_full: Raiders’ dreams take flight in hands of Amari Cooper - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ann Killion
title: Raiders’ dreams take flight in hands of Amari Cooper
text:
Photo: Harry How, Getty Images Jimmy Wilson can’t stop Amari Cooper from making this catch in the second quarter, during which he had 117 receiving yards. Jimmy Wilson can’t stop Amari Cooper from making this catch in...
SAN DIEGO — What does hope look like? It looks like a 6-foot-1, 210-pound, lightning-fast young man named Amari Cooper. Jimmy Wilson can’t stop Amari Cooper from making this catch in the second quarter, during which he had 117 receiving yards. Jimmy Wilson can’t stop Amari Cooper from making this catch in...
